name: Fisher-Price Power Wheels Barbie Volkswagen New Beetle 6-Volt Battery-Powered Ride-On
categoryPath: Toys/Kids' Bikes & Riding Toys/Ride On Toys

reviews.name: Fisher-Price Power Wheels Barbie Volkswagen New Beetle 6-Volt Battery-Powered Ride-On
reviews.reviewText: My {two} year old has always loved our older daughter's Jeep but her feet couldn't reach the pedals so we knew after lots of research this would be perfect for our little girls second birthday because she has a door to get in and out of and she can reach the pedals. It's perfect size and works great outside and inside. Wonderful Product. The only problem was getting the stickers on.. They are horrible to get on perfect. Other than that it's an awesome product!
reviews.title: Perfect for our 2 year old !!

reviews.name: Fisher-Price Power Wheels Barbie Volkswagen New Beetle 6-Volt Battery-Powered Ride-On
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves her car. Better than I expected.
reviews.title: Cute car

reviews.name: Fisher-Price Power Wheels Barbie Volkswagen New Beetle 6-Volt Battery-Powered Ride-On
reviews.reviewText: Too young to press pedal but loves to get in and out until she can!!
reviews.title: Power wheels for the little one

reviews.name: Fisher-Price Power Wheels Barbie Volkswagen New Beetle 6-Volt Battery-Powered Ride-On
reviews.reviewText: She loves it. Just turned a year old, so can't make it go yet, but loves opening the door and getting in by herself. A super birthday gift for my grandbaby.
reviews.title: Great

reviews.name: Fisher-Price Power Wheels Barbie Volkswagen New Beetle 6-Volt Battery-Powered Ride-On
reviews.reviewText:
Was mostly assembled, sticker sheet was wrinkled and was a chore to place. The battery needing to be charged for so long (18 hrs initially then 14 hrs after each use) isn't very user friendly.
Over-all is a nice first toy vehicle.
reviews.title: A good starter vehicle
